vignette: Thank you for contributing to this study! This page is an attention check so we can make sure you're not a bot and can award you your pay when you complete the study.
less: Please select "extremely likely" for this question.
more: Please select "extremely unlikely" for this question.
equal: Please select "extremely likely" for this question.

vignette: Consider Alice and Angela, who work at the same company. They meet weekly. Every time they meet, Alice spends most of the one-hour meeting talking, while Angela spends most of the one-hour meeting listening and asking questions. How likely is it that
less: Angela and Alice are in a relationship where Angela has less power, status, or influence than Alice.
more: Angela and Alice are in a relationship where Angela has more power, status, or influence than Alice.
equal: Angela and Alice are in a relationship where they have equal power, status, or influence.

more: Angela and Alice are in a relationship where Angela has more power, status, or influence than Alice.
equal: Angela and Alice are in a relationship where they have equal power, status, or influence.
